    • getGameDetail

      @GetMapping(value="/api/games/{gameId}", produces="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.web.context.request.async.DeferredResult<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String>> getGameDetail(@PathVariable long gameId, @RequestParam(required=false) String hash)
      handle the long polling requests for all public visible game details.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game id
      hash - hashed previous response payload
      Returns:
      a deferred return payload JSON string response

    • launchGame

      @PutMapping(value="/api/games/{gameId}", consumes="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> launchGame(@PathVariable long gameId, @RequestBody LauncherInfo launcherInfo)
      Launch game PUT request handling endpoint. It handles the PUT request of creating game service sent from LS. LS sent this PUT request because client sends a launch request to LS first
      Parameters:
      gameId - game id
      launcherInfo - JSON request body that contains the info needed to PUT a game service
      Returns:
      a response body of the reply of launch game request.
